1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Prophet said: "Whoever engages in sexual intercourse with a menstruating woman, or a woman in her anus, consults a soothsayer, then he has disbelieved in what was revealed to Muhammad

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ إِتْيَانِ الْحَائِضِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Dislike For Engaging In Sexual Intercourse With A Menstruating Woman
